participant_1.background:
My parents were not a good fit for me, so I moved out when I was 14.
I have fond memories of playing basketball with my friends in the park.
i would like to retire to hawaii in the next 10 years.
i give lessons on string instruments.
i take pride in getting straight as.

participant_2.background:
I like to visit mindful blogs to learn more about how to be more mindful in my daily life.
I am determined to overcome my fears and achieve my goals.
I am afraid of failing to reach my full potential.
i am former military.
My family is supportive and understanding, even though they don't know about my love life.

content.text: Hey, how are you today?
Pretty good, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm glad to hear you're doing good.
Me too! I'm actually excited to learn more about you, since we're going to be chatting for a bit. What are some of your hobbies?
I have a lot of hobbies, but my favorite one is playing basketball. I used to play in high school and college, and I still play on a rec league team.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to play basketball, but I'm not very coordinated.
It's never too late to learn! And it's a great way to get in shape.
I know, I know. I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family and friends.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and mystery novels.
I love historical fiction too! I've read a lot of books about the Civil War.
I've never read any books about the Civil War, but I've always been interested in learning more about it.
You should definitely check out some books about it! It's a fascinating time in American history.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome! So, what are some of your goals for the future?
I have a few goals for the future. I want to get my master's degree, start a family, and travel the world.
Those are all great goals! I'm sure you'll achieve them all.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what are some of your fears?
I have a few fears, but my biggest fear is failing to reach my full potential.
That's a common fear, but I'm sure you're capable of achieving anything you set your mind to.
Thanks for the encouragement. I hope you're right.
I am right. You're a smart and capable person, and I know you can do anything you set your mind to.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
